metadata.Title: CVE-2021-28952 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.11.8. Thesound/soc/qcom/sdm845.c soundwire device driver has a buffer overflow whenan unexpected port ID number is encountered, aka CID-1c668e1c0a0f. (Thishas been fixed in 5.12-rc4.)

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-28952` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-2.16
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
